mapper.insert: insert into WY_TUNEL_MANUAL (INT_ID, PROP, ROAD_ID, TUNEL_LENGTH, ANTENNATYPE, LINETYPE, COVERTYPE, COVERRANGEDESC, ADDRESS, TUNEL_HIGH, RRUNUM, RRUADDRESS, REPEATERNUM, REPEATERADDRESS, DRYNUM, DRYADDRESS, SHAREFLAG, MCHROOMFLAG, MCHROONAREA, METERADRESS, BUILDDATE, OWNER, OWNERTEL, REMARK, INTIME, INUSER,TOWN,VILLAGE) values (#{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{roadId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tunelLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{antennatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{covertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverrangedesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tunelHigh,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rrunum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rruaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repeaternum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repeateraddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dryaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mchroomflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchroonarea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{meteradress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{builddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{inuser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{town},#{village})

update WY_TUNEL_MANUAL
PROP = #{prop,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ROAD_ID = #{roadId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TUNEL_LENGTH = #{tunelLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ANTENNATYPE = #{antennatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where INT_ID = #{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
